Flow.description: Master process for when cases are created or updated

value.stringValue: ( ISNEW() || ( ISCHANGED([Case].Customer_Product__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].Priority) || ISCHANGED([Case].Affected_Version__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].RecordType.Name)) ) && ( [Case].RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' && ISPICKVAL([Case].Affected_Version__c,'Production') && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Support_SLA_Customer__c)) && NOT(ISNULL([Case].AccountId)) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: ( ISNEW() || ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Customer_Product__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Priority}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Affected_Version__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name})) ) && ( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'I am experiencing an issue' && ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Affected_Version__c},'Production') && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Support_SLA_Customer__c})) && NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.AccountId})) )

value.stringValue: ( ISCHANGED([Case].Customer_Product__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].Priority) || ISCHANGED([Case].Affected_Version__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].AccountId) || ISCHANGED([Case].RecordType.Name) ) && ( NOT([Case].RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue') || NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Affected_Version__c,'Production')) || ISBLANK([Case].Support_SLA_Customer__c) || NOT(ISNULL([Case].AccountId)) ) && PRIORVALUE([Case].Service_Credits_SLA_Reporting__c ) != FALSE

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Customer_Product__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Priority}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Affected_Version__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.AccountId}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}) ) && ( NOT({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'I am experiencing an issue') || NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Affected_Version__c},'Production')) || ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Support_SLA_Customer__c}) || NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.AccountId})) ) && PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Service_Credits_SLA_Reporting__c} ) != FALSE

value.stringValue: ( ISCHANGED([Case].Customer_Product__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].Priority) || ISCHANGED([Case].Affected_Version__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].AccountId) || ISCHANGED([Case].RecordType.Name) ) && ( NOT([Case].RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue') || NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Affected_Version__c,'Production')) || ISBLANK([Case].Support_SLA_Customer__c) || NOT(ISNULL([Case].AccountId)) ) && PRIORVALUE([Case].Service_Credits_SLA_Reporting__c ) != FALSE

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3_pmetrule
formulas.expression: ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Customer_Product__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Priority}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Affected_Version__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.AccountId}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.RecordType.Name}) ) && ( NOT({!myVariable_old.RecordType.Name} = 'I am experiencing an issue') || NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Affected_Version__c},'Production')) || ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Support_SLA_Customer__c}) || NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_old.AccountId})) ) && PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_old.Service_Credits_SLA_Reporting__c} ) != FALSE

Flow.label: Case - Update
